5 estimator::estimator()
6 {
7 ros::NodeHandle nh;
8 got_msg_ = false;
9 sub_msgs_ = nh.subscribe("/lrrObjects", 10, &estimator::messageCallback, this);
10 //timer_ = private_nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(0.1), std::bind(&estimator::timerCallback, this, _1));
11 for(int i = 0; i<10; i++)
12 trackers_.push_back(kalman_filter::kalmanFilter());
13 }
14
15 estimator::~estimator()
16 {
17 ROS_INFO("Goodbye");
18 }
19
20 int estimator::getClosestTracker(const measurement meas)
21 {
22 double dist = std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
23 int closest = 0; // Maybe init this -1?
24 double temp = 0;
25 for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
26 {
27 temp = hypot(trackers_[i].mean_(0) - meas.x_, trackers_[i].mean_(1) - meas.y_);
28 if(temp < dist)
29 {
30 dist = temp;
31 closest = i;
32 }
33 }
34 return closest;
35 }
36
37 void estimator::messageCallback(const std_msgs::Float32MultiArray msg)
38 {
39 measurements_ = common::parseMeasurements(msg); // Store to array could be better if processing freq is low.
40 uviz_.visualizeArrays(measurements_);
41 for(int i = 0; i < measurements_.size(); i++)
42 {
43 ROS_INFO("Iterating %d", i);
44 if(trackers_[i].first_)
45 {
46 trackers_[i].assign(measurements_[i]);
47 trackers_[i].first_ = false;
48 }
49 else
50 {
51 int closest = getClosestTracker(measurements_[i]); // Add only one correspondence at a time. Drop if
52 // got correspondence this cycle.
53 trackers_[closest].iterate(measurements_[i]); // These correspondences are going to be calculated via JIPDA
54 }
55 ROS_INFO("Filtered %d", i);
56 uviz_.visFilterStates(trackers_[i].mean_, trackers_[i].cov_, std::to_string(i));
57 ROS_INFO("Visualized %d", i);
58 }
59 got_msg_ = true;
60 }
61
62 void estimator::timerCallback(const ros::TimerEvent& event)
63 {
64 //Process stuff here.
65 if(got_msg_)
66 {
67 ROS_INFO("Processing");
68 uviz_.visualizeArrays(measurements_);
69 got_msg_ = false;
70 }
71 else
72 {
73 ROS_DEBUG("Skipping no msg");
74 }
75 }
76};
